title: Watch: Singer-songwriter George Michael honoured with British Royal Mint collectable coin
content: George Michael, the late British singer-songwriter, is being honored with a collectible coin. Britain's Royal Mint said the new coin pays tribute to the music star's 1987 hit solo single ‘Faith’ https://t.co/VEOt1n7TqU pic.twitter.com/O2CGSNSeCG— Reuters (@Reuters) February 26, 2024
author: Scroll Staff
